PerfectNetExp.abs: 主教乌斐拉(Ulfilas)更以拉丁字母，为哥德人创立文字，并为他们翻译了哥德文的圣经。后来当这些哥德人攻陷罗马城时，由于他们已 …

means.word_mean: 1. a Christian believed to be of Cappadocian descent who became bishop of the Visigoths in 341 and translated the Bible from Greek into Gothic; traditionally held to have invented the Gothic alphabet (311-382)
